artist: Designer: William Stephen Coleman; Manufacturer: Minton and Company
creditline: Gift of Christopher Monkhouse in honor of Corine Wegener becoming Assistant Curator
description: transfer design of scallop, lobster claw, coral, shells and rocks
markings:
on bottom, transfer design, in black: [IV (inside a circle)/ 18/ 6 Rd C/ W (inside a diamond)] + [(bird, flower and butterfly) No 6 (incised) (inside a triangle) W. S. Coleman Inv. + & Del. +/ MINTON & CO Manuf. + (on a ribbon)]
on bottom: four illegible stamps
title: Plate
